sentences.english: "Yes, " the woman says, "You're checking for breast cancer."
sentences.chinese: “知道，”，美呂說，“你在檢查乳腺癌。”

sentences.english: P16 protein may serve as an important indicator of estimating prognosis of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: P16可作爲臨牀上判定乳腺癌預後的一個新指標。

sentences.english: Breast cancer is the second leading cause of cancer-related deaths among American women.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌是美國婦女癌症相關死因中列於第二位。

sentences.english: The histologic classification of breast carcinoma into duct and lobular type lacks the basis of histogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌分類爲導管癌和小葉癌缺少組織發生學依據。

sentences.english: But the mechanism of alcohol-induced breast cancer are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 但是酒精緻乳腺癌的機理尚不清楚。

sentences.english: Objective To study the antitumor effect of gemcitabine in chemotherapy with breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討吉西他濱在乳腺癌化療中的作用。

sentences.english: The routine examination is hard to detect micrometastasis cell in peripheral blood of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 對於乳腺癌外周血微轉移，常規檢查難以發現。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of neoadjuvant chemotherapy on advanced breast cancer .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討新輔助化療在晚期乳腺癌治療中的效果。

sentences.english: An oft-reported estimate is the lifetime breast cancer rate among women.
sentences.chinese: 一個常常被報道的估計是女性一生患乳腺癌的風險。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of "Xiaojia Decoction" in preventing the recurrence and metastasis of postoperative mammary carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察消瘕方預防乳腺癌術後的復發及轉移。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the operability and perioperative management of breast carcinoma patients with diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 探討合併糖尿病的乳腺癌手術可行性及圍手術期處理。

sentences.english: The study included 268 women with breast cancer and 457 healthy controls.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究包括了268例乳腺癌和457例健康者。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the reason for recurrence of breast cancer onthe chest wall after mastectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討乳腺癌術後胸壁局部復發因素及預後意義。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the D-limonene on the clinical impact of lymph node breast cancer and research.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討右旋檸烯對乳腺癌淋巴結轉移的影響。

sentences.english: Justice O’Connor herself underwent surgery for breast cancer in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 奧康納大法官在1988年也接受過乳腺癌的手術。

sentences.english: When she did start telling clients she had breast cancer, the result was surprising: "In many ways, it has allowed me to connect to customers and suppliers and others in my industry, " says Zobel.
sentences.chinese: 當她開始告訴客戶自己患了乳腺癌時，大家都很震驚。

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
